name: Munchlax
author: sowsow
flavor_text: It hides food under its long fur, but it sometimes forgets about it and causes a stinky disturbance.

abilities.name: Snack Search
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, put a card from your discard pile on top of your deck. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.
